title: Jug
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltd; 1964 Phelps Warren, NY
description: Ovoid body, long angled spout, large loop handle, cut pattern of small diamonds bottom of sides, above a row of tick pillar flutes, neck with 3 faceted prismatic rings; spout notched at edges, triangular thumbs piece cut at top of handle; that bottom cut with narrow radiating flutes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Jug.
glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-164.
